report.title: Reference output basic
report.description: Basic output of a reference range calculation for a manually specified bat detector record nights.
report.query: select fullset.id, fullset.date_start as night, fullset.passes, round(fullset.percentile*100) as percentile from ( select id, date_start, day_of_year, passes, percent_rank() over (order by passes) as percentile from ( select id, date_start, day_of_year, external_key, passes from ecobat_occurrences o where 1=1 and external_key='#input_taxa_taxon_list_external_key#' #filters# union select -1, null, null, '#input_taxa_taxon_list_external_key#', #input_passes# order by id ) as o ) as fullset where fullset.id=-1

param.name: filter_spatial_km
param.description: Number of km of radius to limit the reference set to.

param.name: filter_date
param.description: Limit to records +/- 30 days of the input
param.where: case when extract(doy from '#input_date#'::date) >= 30 and extract(doy from '#input_date#'::date) <= 335 then day_of_year <= extract(doy from '#input_date#'::date) + 30 and day_of_year >= extract(doy from '#input_date#'::date) - 30 when #input_date# < 30 then day_of_year <= extract(doy from '#input_date#'::date) + 30 or day_of_year >= extract(doy from '#input_date#'::date) + 365 - 30 else day_of_year >= extract(doy from '#input_date#'::date) - 30 or day_of_year <= extract(doy from '#input_date#'::date) - 365 + 30 end

param.name: filter_temp
param.description: Limit to records +/- 2deg of the input

param.name: filter_wind
param.description: Limit to records +/- 2mph of the input

param.name: filter_definition_of_pass
param.description: Limit to records with same definition of pass

param.name: input_taxa_taxon_list_external_key
param.description: Preferred external key of the species being input into the report

param.name: input_date
param.description: Date of the record to compare against

param.name: input_passes
param.description: Number of passes being input into the report

param.name: input_geom
param.description: Geometry of site being passed into the report

param.name: input_temp
param.description: Temperature at sunset being input into the report in degC

param.name: input_wind
param.description: Wind speed at sunset in mph

param.name: input_pass_definition_id
param.description: Pass definition for record to compare against
